content.rendered:
Directed by Vikram Bhatt.

Written by Girish Dhamija.

Cast Emraan Hashmi(Aditya). Kriti Kharbanda(Shaina). Suzanna Mukherjee(Shreya). Gaurav Arora(Rehan). Ashwath Bhatt(Trilok Shastri). Hargun Grover(Aman).Trupti Agarwal. George Burcea(Anton (uncredited)) . Claudia Susanu(Gipsy Woman). Vlad Udrescu(Anton). Madhu Anand Chandhock(Rehan’s Mother (uncredited))

Languages Hindi. English.

Producers Mukesh Bhatt. Sakshi Bhatt. Vishesh Bhatt. Hanif Chunawala. Ajay Kapoor. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Sumit Sabharwal. Kumkum Saigal. Yogiraj Shetty.

Production Vishesh Films.
